Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Conserve_Power.help: You can focus for a moment to conserve your Endurance. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: Your concentrate and Conserve your Power. Your powers now cost less Endurance for a while.

Temp_Invulnerability.help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. You must be level 41 and have Power Blast or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Recharge: Fast
Temp_Invulnerability.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Energy_Torrent.help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. You must be level 41 and have Power Blast or Conserve Power before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Boost.help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. You must be level 44 and have two other Primal Forces Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You tap into your inner power and boost the abilities of your next few attacks.
